WorkItem.Description: Was trying to optimize a Spriest, and it appears that the item [id 47879] Fetish of Volatile Power is only showing the crit chance, and not the stacking spellpower benefit that it should.  I'm not sure if I'm reporting this in the proper place, just thought it should be seen.  The same problem seems to be the case for [id 48018] which is just the higher iLvL version.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Fetish of Volatile Power proc not modeled

Comments.Message:
I would like to add that this proc be modeled as well if it could for a Mage.  With the update as of the other day(2.3.5), its still not in there.
IF there is some way to manually add a similar effect to get the proc close, i will gladly do that as well.

Thanks
The stacking haste on this trinket is a bit too hard to model properly.  I added an approximate model however.
